Title: If....
Writer: David Sherwin (screenplay), David Sherwin (original script: "Crusaders"), John Howlett (original script: "Crusaders")
Actors: Malcolm McDowell, David Wood, Richard Warwick, Christine Noonan
Plot: In this allegorical story, a revolution led by pupil Mick Travis takes place at an old established private school in England.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 3 nominations.
